name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter logo, favicon, page title and embeds

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the little blue bird to Twitter or X and change the page title, favicon and buttons accordingly. Embedded posts included!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring back the little blue bird from the good old days of Twitter. The most complete browser extension for X reversal out there!

- Fixes all the "X" scalable vector graphics it can find on any page on X.com or Twitter.com
- Covers the Twitter/X welcome screen as well as the main feed
- Replace "Post" button by "Tweet" (*) — ɴᴇᴡ
- It replace the favicon
- It replace the page title
- It also works for embedded posts — ɴᴇᴡ
- Tested on Firefox, Chrome, Kiwi Mobile and Firefox Mobile

* currently works for English, Spanish, French, Italian, German and Dutch
